name: Nominader
description:
Nominader is a minimalist style arcade action game. Challenge yourself to beat your high score through endless level game play. Throughout the game you will have to avoid obstacles, enemies chasing you, and flying obstacles. While accomplishing all of these you will collect stars to further progress you high score. Get lost in the music while you take your score and skills to the next level in Nominader!

Features:
Minimalist Style
Easy Controls
Endless Game Play
High Score Tracker
